website_summaries.verdict: This no-frills rice cooker works well for two to four people and reliably produces evenly cooked rice.
pros: With only two modes — cook and warm — this is one of the simpler models available
Quickly cooks a couple of cups of rice
cons: Some customers found the power switch on the cable inconvenient

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: I’m really happy with my new rice cooker. It’s easy to use and clean. As student I never have much time to cook but the rice cooker makes it pretty easy. I can turn on the rice cooker before I go to classes and when I come back I’ve perfectly cooked warm rice. It’s the perfect choice for anyone who loves rice!
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and produces much better rice than my last 2 rice cookers.
customer_reviews.text: Some reviewers have complained about lack of UK plug and English instructions. This rice cooker came with both. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant little rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: This is a brilliant little rice cooker. It cooks the rice perfectly and the rice doesn't stick to the bottom. It even has a little plastic thing that catches the water when you open the lid! A tiny negative for me is that the cooker itself doesn't have a switch. Would've been nicer rather than having to turn it on and off from the plug switch. Doesn't stop me giving it a 5 star as I feel its only a minor inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs JGristable

customer_reviews.title: Quality rice every time
customer_reviews.text: Gave it a test run with the cheapest supermarket long grain rice, 38p a kg, didnt rinse it precook. Very good results. Second cook with rinsed rice slightly better. Excellent rice cooking for 1 to 2 people although there is a slight crust on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: andrew brian chilvers

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly cooked rice, everytime
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, good size, doesn't take up much space on worktop. You don't have to monitor progress of the rice cooking at all, like I have had to with my previous 3 rice cookers (in a 2 year period!!!) all which ended up burning the rice in various degrees no matter how long the cooker was on. Absolutely love this, and would recommend it most highly for anyone who loves rice. Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Esther Mapata

customer_reviews.title: good little cooker for two to four persons.
customer_reviews.text: used this as a rice cooker for two persons. it performs well. however, one has to learn by experience and trial and error to get the right amount of water to right amount of rice to get the type of cooked product one likes. Rice tends to stick to the side of the bowl inspite of being non stick. otherwise it performs well.
customer_reviews.author: Ajit

customer_reviews.title: USELESS- they undercook rice
customer_reviews.text: Having grown up in Hong Kong and Tokyo, my household has owned rice cookers for the last 40 years' I have never had any trouble with a rice cooker, having owned high end Japanese ones and cheap and cheerful ones This product is not fit for purpose. We have now wasted 12 cups of rice trying to make it work. It is not a one off as we had a replacement sent that had exactly the same problem. Only buy this if you like half cooked crunchy rice !
customer_reviews.author: miss ag lambley

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rice Cooker
customer_reviews.text: Bought it two weeks ago, used it twice. It takes about 20mins to cook a cup of rice, and the cooked rice is nice. Seems to be a successful shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Fay

customer_reviews.title: quality and use
customer_reviews.text: cheap material... low quality... cheap looking... burn rice on warm ..... do same job like 20 pound other brands.... nothing special here.... i think it too esxpensive pay 40 pounds in uk... for crap to make rice... better buy chepper one ... will be the same ) i hope this rewiew will help some one .
customer_reviews.author: afk.style

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for 7 months now and have used it roughly every couple of weeks. The results have been very good. It's worth noting that certain rice types require different amounts of water and there's no "one size fits all". e.g. Thai Jasmine rice require 30-40% less water than the recommended amounts to get a nice dry fluffy result but you can experiment with this until you get what you like with each rice type. I've had no burning at the base and certanly no uncooked results. I would happily recommend this little cooker!
customer_reviews.author: Martin Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Great Gadget for little money!
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker is the basic model and does what it says it does- with simplicity and ease. I’ve used it three times so far and every time the rice turned out great. As there are no guidelines for cooking the rice I just did what I always do and use the 1:2 ratio of rice to water. I’ve used brown basmati rice and I used white basmati rice both were cooked perfectly I can wholeheartedly recommend this little machine!
customer_reviews.author: Tineke

customer_reviews.title: Cooks just like my now-retired National Rice Cooker used to!  High praise indeed.
customer_reviews.text: Worked exactly as I wanted it to. Rinse the rice around the pot with warm water 2-3 times, drain and let rice settle evenly in bottom of pan, then fill hot water to just below first knuckle of my index finger above rice (medium sized woman's fingers!). Then set to cook. Perfect. Looks nice and easy to clean inside and out. Only slight drawback is that the plug does not always fit first time into the socket on the side of the cooker. Need to adjust/wiggle it before will come on. Haven't returned it because feel it is more of a design issue than loose connection. Really pleased with this as a much cheaper option than National.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good rice but sticks and burns
customer_reviews.text: This is my first rice cooker so I didn’t know what to expect. It’s easy to use and little so minimal storage, enough for my family of 4, but each time I use it the rice sticks and occasionally burns. I have to soak the non stick pan overnight to release the rice, this wastes about half a portion of rice per go. It also makes the whole thing a bit of a faff. I don’t want to wash it with anything more scrubby than a sponge so I also can’t really clean it- there is often rice scum left over...
customer_reviews.author: Pam Edmunds

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: A cup of rice, two cups of water, switch it on and within 10 minutes, hey presto perfectly cooked rice. Takes away all the hassle of standing over a boiling pot of water, continually adding water, stirring up the rice. This machine provides perfect rice every time.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Low

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I bought this product. The size is just fit for my family. It is easy to use and clean. The time spent on cooking is about 20 minutes. It is reasonable and fast. I always wash my rice in another bowl before cooking in order to keep the non-stick coating of inner bowl from scratches. It is good to receive two plugs, one for UK use and another one for EU use. The delivery is fast and packed in a good condition. I am happy to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Zilla

customer_reviews.title: Bad result..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to replace my rice cooker from my home country. I expect that I would be the same or better than my old rice cooker. However, this rice cooker always make the rice hard.
customer_reviews.author: Muhammad Herdi Pratama

customer_reviews.title: So good, I bought 3 for other purposes lol
customer_reviews.text: So the company might not intend it for the purpose I use it but lol. I bought one and the rice and warm function were brilliant,then..my pressure cooker broke so I tried using this rice cooker for chilli,since then I now have three and have tried pasta,thai curry,chilli ,all sorts in it and it's perfect and keeps it all hot after its finished too. Will I buy again?only if one of the three I have gets broken then yes. PS it does cook rice perfectly too lol
customer_reviews.author: Sara Jane

customer_reviews.title: Broke down after 5 months of moderate use?
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine in March 2020 in preparation for the lockdown in the UK. It worked just fine for five months and all I used it for is cooking rice for myself (I live alone) every other day. And now in August 2020 it just broke down. I find it hard to believe it breaks down after 5 months of very moderate use, while the one I have back at home in China has served my family for 15 years and is being used very extensively...I have to leave a bad review!
customer_reviews.author: Kuan Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product, great price. Can't believe I went without for so long
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this, finally a clean way to do rice. No more water marks on the hob! Very easy to use and easy to clean. Having never used one before I'm having to learn how much water to use with a batch, as I'm used to using boil in the bag rice. I've also used it to cook pasta! A must have for the kitchen, when it eventually fails I'd replace it in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Aaron Di Fante

customer_reviews.title: Great size for 2ppl
customer_reviews.text: We are 2 people. This rice cooker is such a good size for 2 people. My previous rice cooker was just too big. We usually only cook 2 cups of rice. We use the Tesco Jasmine white rice and the recommended ratio of rice:water is 1:1. The texture of the rice is soft and fluffy and has a good bite to it. We tend not to use the warm function because it can make the bottom layer of rice overcook. Sometimes a very thin layer gets very lightly burnt at the bottom but I really like that - much like chinese claypot rice. Apart from that, the rest of our rice is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: anythingthatspurple

customer_reviews.title: Undercooked Rice
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rice cooker during the Prime Day deal. The package arrived quickly, however, unfortunately the positive end there. This rice cooker looks and feels like cheap plastic and for the price I paid, despite heavy discount on Prime Day, I expected somewhat better quality item which would look nice sitting on the Kitchen worktop. While cooking rice, despite following all the instructions correctly, half of the rice were undercooked. I contacted seller for support and directions however no response since my email to them for nearly a week. Extremely disappointed with this cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Zed B

customer_reviews.title: Once you work it out the rice is good
customer_reviews.text: I think this is expensive as it feels very cheap. The instructions are too sparse and do not tell you how to use the product properly. You are left guessing how much rice and water to use. I just did my usual 1 cup per person then two cups of water. It doesn't explain how the rice cooker knows when to stop cooking and leaves you guessing that it will turn to warm when the rice is done. This is my first rice cooker so not used to how they work. I am however really happy with the results of the rice. I am glad I bought it even though I think it is too expensive for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs KE Bulpitt

customer_reviews.title: Best piece of kitchen equipment I've bought in years.
customer_reviews.text: My rice cooking is legendary for being awful. The standard joke in our house is how many slices of rice would you like? This has solved the problem. Makes perfect rice every time. My only negative comment would be that the instructions are very vague. It says put the desired amount of rice and water in the pot. Some ratios would have been helpful. I find 4 cups of rice and 5 of water work out about right. Wish I would have bought one of these years ago. Would have saved a lot of disappointed looks from the family when I gave them their dinner!!
customer_reviews.author: blossom

customer_reviews.title: Great size and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son to use at uni, he's been making rice with it non stop and cannot lives without it anymore! It is a compact size and yet makes rice for up to 8 portions, cooked in 15 min (without worrying it's going to make a mess be over/undercooked). So easy to use (you can make flavoured rice in it) and to clean, I am truly sastisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Missie

customer_reviews.title: Reishunger? You will certainly be hungry after trying to cook rice with it.
customer_reviews.text: I can't cook basmati rice to save my life, others I can do but with basmati I end up with splodge. So I thought that this would make a better job than I could. It is well made and looks the part. But after following the instructions; washing the basmati rice, adding water and setting the cooker off it came up with splodge. It sort of boils and steams the rice. Sent it back because I'd rather make splodge on the hob myself than have a useless gadget clogging up the kitchen worktop doing the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Brian-O-Blivion

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: This cooks the rice reasonably but rice sticks to the bottom very very badly indeed i have upped the amount of water which makes the rice a bit too wet when cooked; tried tiny bit of oil ETC in the bottom but so far to no avail. and in my case it is a lot of rice that sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Keith. J.  Mclaughin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy to clean, makes rice easy to eat.
customer_reviews.text: Great rice cooker. I thought ‘oh I don’t need one, the pan is fine’, and I made fairly good rice in a pan 70% of the time. But this is a super easy to use tub that makes perfect rice every time with a tiny bit of measuring at the start, and it keeps it safe to eat for up to 8 hours. I’m leaving this review because I’m genuinely happy with the product, and because the email asking for feedback from Reishunger was very sweet in asking for it whether positive or negative. Well it’s all positive folks, thanks for making a quality rice cooker at a solid price, and keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Ok... non stick nonsense. Burns the rice a little
customer_reviews.text: Literally from first use, the rice burns a little / sticks to the bottom. The “non stick honeycomb pattern” if anything actually just gives the burnt rice something to stick too. Cooks rice fine and easy to use, but definitely not non stick, also annoying to clean.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Slightly damaged when received
customer_reviews.text: The box arrive half opened, I thought it would be ok as there is other box inside. Unfortunately, when open the box, the rice cooker was slightly damaged, with some paint off and slightly dent. I decided not to return, but the package for the rice cooker should be better. I believe this is not the first time buyer complained about the damage.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Bowry

customer_reviews.title: A great addition
customer_reviews.text: A great addition to the kitchen. The rice it makes is great, and it is simple to use and easy to clean. The two things I think it is missing that make me give it 4 rather than 5 stars are: a) Some kind of handle to lift the bowl out of the unit. b) A timer, or in a perfect world, a time to when it is ready. But, can live without them and wouldn't be without the cooker.
customer_reviews.author: David Atherton

customer_reviews.title: Well designed, does the job - would be better with a power switch.
customer_reviews.text: This is a basic, but well-designed rice cooker. It has two setting, cook and warm. It automatically switches over to warm once the rice is cooked. It is fine for my needs but I can imagine more discerning cooks may want more features. The only downside is no on/off switch. You have to plug/unplug it to turn it off and on, hence the 4 star rating. I wouldn't hesitate to buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: James Oxford

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Easy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy and simple to use! Never going back to cooking rice on a stove, it easy, simple and the Manuel has simple instructions that comes in a range of languages including English. Comes with a measuring cup, spoon and even a tray so you can steam vegetables too! The keep warm system is brilliant for when you're cooking a big family meal! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Great buy would recommend
customer_reviews.text: So the trick to cook rice with this is when it’s done just turn it off and let it sit for extra 15-20mins so the bottom bit would cook and wouldn’t be really hard and chewy. It’s a great buy as it’s suitable for 2 people / small family. I used it to cook chicken soup as well and it works brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Badly damaged, broken
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box and got a badly damaged item. You can see its broken, deformed, see the gaps too. You need to be serious with your packaging and quality control to protect product. Returning this tomorrow after work. I didnt want to put a star but Im unable to submit my comment if I wont.
customer_reviews.author: Nelie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, makes excellent rice. You do have to experiment a little to get the rice/water proportions as you like them, but it’s very consistent once that’s done. Only minor downside is there is a little browning/sticking of the rice at the bottom sometimes, which would probably stop if you could be bothered stirring during cooking, but I can’t, and it’s easy to work around and clean. My first rice cooker, and I already wonder why I ever cooked it on the stove. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mj Lowrey

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect.. I have that product for several month. It is very good. The only reason why I do not give it five star is that it does not have off switch. It is either on cook or warm. The only way to turn it off is to unplug that.. Everything else is perfect. The rice taste is good. It is very easy to use. It has a good build quality. It cooks ricw very quickly. .
customer_reviews.author: Mehdi Tavakol

customer_reviews.title: Rice sticks to the bottom and not German as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this rice cooker it replaced a similar looking one which cooked rice very well and only occasionally stuck to the bottom of the pan. This one, even though it boasts a honeycomb bottom to stop it sticking is far worse a large amount of rice is lost as it sticks to the bottom of the cooking pan and takes a lot of soaking in water to remove it. I have tried spraying it with oil which helps a bit. The other problem I have with this rice cooker is it proclaims to be German manufactured, however it is made in China. Very misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Cooks perfectly every time. I used always make my rice either too dry or too soggy and this is perfect! Great value for money!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Reid

customer_reviews.title: It's ok. nothing special. The bowl inside has a very good non-stick which is a bonus.
customer_reviews.text: The metal bowl inside is good quality. but the outside is no better than any other cheap rice cooker. It's ok but I would just buy a named brand a cheaper price to be honest. The metal bowl is very good inside it's a very thick nonstick.
customer_reviews.author: mr nicholas a pearce

customer_reviews.title: Rice Cooker
customer_reviews.text: Mum loves it just a little small should have realised that when I ordered but does a quality job with the rice nice and fluffy highly recommend but if your looking for something bigger look at Amazon’s other ranges they have
customer_reviews.author: Shazy

customer_reviews.title: Default Rice Cooker
customer_reviews.text: Abit disappointed with this Product. The power point inside the Cooker was loose & hence kept flickering on the "Cook/Warm" indicator. The Manufacturer were fast with their response & requested me to return the product so that they could rectify the fault. This could be a one off defect in the production line. Lets hope other Customers did not encounter similar problem like i had. Philip Manuel (UK)
customer_reviews.author: Philip Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for sure
customer_reviews.text: An excellent rice cooker for a low price, rice comes out fluffy and perfectly cooked, I always throw some vegetables in the steam tray and they're cooked great everytime, it's easy to clean after, also comes with a UK and EU plug and other handy accessories. I really recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Mati Greswuld

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective.
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic and had changed the way I eat rice forever. The pan inside is sturdy and the non stick coating is perfect. The veg tray at the top gets a little flexible after being steamed, but is otherwise ideal for its purpose. I don't think I'm ever going to be without a rice cooker in my future kitchens. This thing is so good that I bought one for my parents too. Well engineered and faultless.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Rice tends to stick
customer_reviews.text: Even if regularly stirred, rice does tend to stick Doesn’t detract from taste/texture though
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Cherry Vodka

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: excellent rice maker. used it about 10 times so far using about 600g long grain and it turns out perfectly fluffy every time. easy to clean and even the rice at the bottom is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Good item if you struggle with either time management occasionally or the fundamentals of cooking rice like me . Good quality well cooked rice . What more do you want ?
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: Buy a better one
customer_reviews.text: This looks good and price is good but it is far too harsh to cook something as delicate as rice,
customer_reviews.author: NICK WILES

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: I have had this rice cooker for a few months. It's really easy to use and clean and it makes perfect rice every single time. It can also be used as a steamer but haven't tried it yet. Got it as an offer for £30 and it's absolutely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia K

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Steamed my veggies in it and a little to long steaming for my taste buds BUT just unplugged from the mains, that's the only downside no on/off button
customer_reviews.author: Mia nutter

customer_reviews.title: Easy quick and very efficient to use
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t agree it does up to six servings , they would be smaller portions. Took a few trials to sort out the right amount of water per cup. First few attempts the rice was rather soggy, but have reduced say 4 cups to two of water. Love the appliance very easy to use, the keep warm button is perfect it does what it says it will do. Would definitely recommend it, once you have sorted out rice and water portions. Very glad I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Adjust water every time
customer_reviews.text: Overall is ok but the rice is not evenly cooked so always have to adjust the water content from time to time
customer_reviews.author: monica leung

customer_reviews.title: If you are serious about rice try other more expensive rich cook.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a temporary replacement, not as good as my old rice cook for sure. This rice cooker heats up too quickly, and it doesn't allow the rice to cook slowly to develop the flavour and taste.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: As described, excellent
customer_reviews.text: As described, excellent. Perfect size for our family just need to work out the correct ratio of water/ rice as the rice at present is wet.....
customer_reviews.author: D G.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, cooks well
customer_reviews.text: We have used many rice cookers and this is a good one. With Thai Jasmine rice equal quantity of washed (wet) rice to water makes lovely fluffy rice. Though if making less than 2 cups, the rice in contact with the bowl can become a little dry. Easy to clean. Haven't tried the steamer yet.
customer_reviews.author: MR A P FROMINGS

customer_reviews.title: Overcooked rice everytime
customer_reviews.text: We’ve used this rice cooker 3 times now and not once has it produced the results we’ve expected! What are we doing wrong? Each time it overcooks the rice, we get dry or burnt rice! I don’t see how this is possible. I’ve used rice cookers before and I’m doing nothing different. This one just seems to over do it. The lack of instructions isn’t helping either
customer_reviews.author: Joss

customer_reviews.title: Great rice cooker for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I've only ever used Asian rice cookers so I was a little nervous as this seems to be a German brand. Nothing to worry about though, works a treat and the steamer tray is a lovely addition!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good but needs improvement not to let the rice stick to the pot so badly
customer_reviews.text: In general the cooker is good but rice sticks to the bottom n difficult to eat rice out n waste a lot of rice each time n has to socked overnight before could the rice out. It definitely needs improvement before I could recommend to someone else! Hope it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Tan

customer_reviews.title: Poor Rice Cooker
customer_reviews.text: Used this twice, on both occasions it burned the rice. Returned it to Amazon and upgraded to a more well known brand.
customer_reviews.author: Surrey Shopper

customer_reviews.title: essential
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know I needed one, until I got one. It is simple and easy to use it, although it could use a guide to rice-water ratio. But eventually I figured it out. I love that I can focus on the main dish while the rice is cooking and I don't have to worry about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great rice cooker!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know what to expect as I’ve never had a rice cooker before. But I would never go back now!! It’s so quick and easy and the rice is always cooked just right. So pleased.
customer_reviews.author: LeKitmeister

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: One of the best deals I had with Amazon, definitely worth what I paid for. A small work can be done on the cabling, as it easily disconnected, and adding a 3rd function (off) other than heating and cooking can make it perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just really bad quality, disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: First of all, yes, it cooks rice really quickly, but unnecessarily so. It cooks so quick that the cooker itself gets so overheated that the outside is scaldingly hot, you can't even touch it. But obviously, I need to place my hand on the outside while I scoop out the rice so I don't know why they didn't think of this.... also it gives off a plastic smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for a week now and really satisfied with the cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Very nice small rice cooker, easy to use, easy to clean. Rice is cooked in exactly 15 minutes, nice and fluffy.
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent rice cooker which provides a nice big batch of rice. Simple to use and clean. Perfectly cooked rice every time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael. B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Never had a rice cooker before and now use this all the time. Works well with rice, quinoa, bulgur wheat, lentils etc. Definitely spritz then bottom with oil before use as rice and grains tend to burn on so can make cleaning a tad annoying. That being said, we use it all the time and it's become a staple for cooking easy dinners.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: easy to use, fast, and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t sure which rice cooker to buy because there are so many out there to choose from, but I’m super happy that I went with this one. It’s the easiest thing to use, cooks the rice beautifully, and because of the nonstick surface, it’s VERY easy to clean. Fingers crossed it lasts, cause so far sooo good.
customer_reviews.author: EHF

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived damaged paint and a dent like it had been struck with a fork. I have also just seen a couple of other reviews like this and wondering if some units are returns/damaged stock I have not used yet and will let this slip. Buyer aware...
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget to have in your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Love my rice cooker .Pop in the rice and water ,turn on and get on with the rest of your meal prep .Frees up room on your hob .Rice perfect every time. Wish I had bought one years ago !
customer_reviews.author: Rachel4domesticgoddess

customer_reviews.title: Mixed bag. So close but so far.
customer_reviews.text: Complete mixed bag. This pretty much makes excellent rice every time, but equally, every time you're left with a layer of crusty rice on the bottom. That means cleaning it is a pain and you're wasting so much rice.
customer_reviews.author: L. R. Simons

customer_reviews.title: Secondhand Item
customer_reviews.text: I received a damaged secondhand item, it was full of scratches and the switch was broken. Update: I ordered a second rice cooker and this one is also damaged, is this a joke? You need to sort out your quality control!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with this. Instructions very vague and rice sticks to bottom of pan despite information saying it doesn’t do this... would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Linda Macdonald

customer_reviews.title: Great rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well packaged, have used twice and love it, the rice was perfect. I couldn't find instructions on how much water but had read other reviews that said 2 cups of water to 1 cup rice and that worked for me. I'm really surprised how quick the rice is cooked.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha07

customer_reviews.title: Saves time and rice
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a very good rice cooker. My previous one was old and the rice always stuck to the pot. This one is easy to clean and I like the cup for rice portions and the holder for the rice scoop. It's a good buy for the price. Would recommend it to anyone who eats a lot of rice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant rice cooker.
customer_reviews.text: Non stick. Rice very light and fluffy. Delicate flavour. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R. Mason

customer_reviews.title: No news is good news
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s ok. I got this for my daughter in law, she hasn’t said anything negative so I assume all is good.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Grundy

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker is great . From 1 cup to 5 cups it make great rice every time
customer_reviews.author: Mr Paul Lees

customer_reviews.title: It's great
customer_reviews.text: I brought this rice cooker a month ago. It works great. Not so much pancake like other comment say...I think they don't add appropriate portion of water. It’s user-friendly. All you need to do is turn on the button. But to be honest, I won't know how many time it would take...Sometimes 15mins, sometimes 20mins...
customer_reviews.author: Whateveryoung

customer_reviews.title: Great little rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Best rice cooker I’ve had in a long time, great value for money. Nice and compact size. Totally non stick easy to clean defiantly worth buying
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use for brown rice. It's brilliant. The rice goes always perfect
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: The perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Cook rice perfectly and just the right size for two to six peoples and non stick at the bottom too
customer_reviews.author: Lai Lewis

customer_reviews.title: No English instructions included
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the first time tonight,rice was very nice.Unfortunately my instructions were in German only.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Lorna Mills

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooker , used everyday so far and works very well.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and simple . We used double the amount of water ( 2 rice to 4 water ) for our brown rice and it cooked and stayed warm lovely. A little stuck to the bottom but this is not unusual and it cleaned easily. Also bought Rice rinsing bowl which again is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sharjo

customer_reviews.title: Returned due to damage from postage
customer_reviews.text: Looks cheap on the outside. But gets great reviews. Didn’t get to use it as it was delivered like the picture. Returning for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Just Ant

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish and useless
customer_reviews.text: The plug didn’t fit the machine and was unstable. The rice cooker did not come on or cook the rice. To say I’m bitterly disappointed is an understatement
customer_reviews.author: Andy Charters

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's meant to!
customer_reviews.text: Cooks rice really well & keeps it warm, easy to clean, instructions aren't great though but to be honest it isn't difficult to work out! one thing though - there's no off switch, so as soon as you plug it in it goes into warm mode and starts heating up.
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: Best rice ever.
customer_reviews.text: My son bought one and recommended it. Wouldnt be without it, my rice is always perfect. Tried making savoury rice and works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Damaged on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Arrived packed carefully in 2 boxes , but item clearly packed damaged ! Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Ajj1

customer_reviews.title: Cooks fast
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to use and cooks rice so well.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Problem with the plug
customer_reviews.text: Little dissapointed. I am having problem with the electricity plug that often loose. So, I have to tighten it repeatedly when cooking. I don't know to fix this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Fahmi

customer_reviews.title: Fast, perfectly cooked rice - excellent
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a simple rice cooker that makes perfect rice fast to replace one I bought in SE Asia many years ago and lasted almost 20 years. This is exactly it. Looks nice, easy to clean, makes perfect rice, no fuss or beeping. Great.
customer_reviews.author: saysabok

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product bought as a gift which was very well received.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this cooker, makes perfect rice in 20 minutes. Saves so much time
customer_reviews.author: cat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent delivery routine and top quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Rice cooker as a Christmas present for my daughter. first class seamless delivery via Amazon Website and looks to be a top quality product. Looking forward to tasting its cooking capabilities. Richard
customer_reviews.author: Richard Graylen

customer_reviews.title: A decent rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Seems a decent rice cooker that does what I want. Only reason i am not giving this 5 stars is that the instructions and videos showing the best way to use it are all in German, which is fair enough it is a German product but it is a bit annoying for an English user.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Matthew Shields

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: easy to use, very useful, taste good. i think everyone will like it.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Rice Cooker you want to have👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Met my expectations and will recommend this product to anyone 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: miss tuka

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to Japanese brands 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Very good rice cooker. As an Asian, I’ve only used Japanese rice cooker brands growing up but they’re so much more expensive here in Europe. Would definitely recommend this one as it’s at par with Japanese brands with good value for money
customer_reviews.author: Abby Granada

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Ruce cooker for Small Household and easy to operate and clean
customer_reviews.text: It is so easy to plug together and operate. Keep rice warm and easy to keep clean. Perfect for small to medium household.
customer_reviews.author: Sasi Sangnoi

customer_reviews.title: Great rice everytime!
customer_reviews.text: We spent time in Indonesia, and saw how they use rice cookers there - we love this one, so easy to get great rice Everytime!
customer_reviews.author: Greg
